titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices of Ireland. A proclamation. Charles Porter Tho. Coningesby. Their Majesties army being now ordered into their Winter-quarters in several parts of this kingdom, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties Castle of Dublin the 7th day of November 1691."
Steele notation: Arms 201. their kingdom 2) may of.
